name: MiniMarketSweep
description:
Here is my take on a classic 90s television show. See how many items you can grab and put into your cart in 5 minutes!

Made in 2 weeks for the 32-bit Jam.

The idea was to create an early 90s PSX style game within 2 weeks.

There are over 170 unique items and 5000+ items in the sore!

I plan to release future updates so check back for new improvements and features

- SuperBirdy
